messages.content: We can’t afford MORE confusion and MORE delay. But that’s all the other parties can deliver.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More funding for every pupil in every school and 4% extra for Putney education
Protecting the environment and stopping Heathrow expansion. Better cycle routes and a plan to make Putney carbon neutral by 2030.
A second entrance and more trains at Putney Station. Lifts for East Putney Station and a faster District Line. New transport links for Roehampton with a solution to the Hammersmith Bridge problem.
More affordable homes for Putney people. Helping renters and first-time buyers. Making Roehampton regeneration work for local people.
Safer streets and more police to protect Putney residents from violent crime. Working with community organisations to tackle causes of knife crime.
Making Putney high street better. Supporting small businesses and shops.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jo Swinson rules out second Tory alliance.

issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school and 4% extra for Putney education

endorsements.endorsement: Jo Swinson rules out second Tory alliance.

images.caption: Vote Will Sweet - Putney carbon neutral by 2030; 4% extra for Putney education; 6,000 more police for London; £33.9 billion for the NHS; The Wandsworth Councillor with a strong track record
